QuestData.Title: Death to Agogridon
QuestData.Description: Our goal is within sight, $n!$b$bWe can break the will of this demon army by bringing down the one who leads them. If we can succeed, Desolace will be ours!$b$bWhen you are ready, lead a group of centaurs through the pass to the south, into Shadowbreak Ravine. Find where Agogridon hides!$b$bI will gather the other khans and meet you there to face him in battle.
QuestData.RewardText: Agogridon is no more.$b$bThe demons shall never again take hold in our lands!
